TextView.android:text: Your Blood Glucose is low. To increase you can choose some of the options below. Take 1/2 a glass of fruit juice e.g. Apple, passion fruit, orange Take a non-diet soda. Take foods with carbohydrates like rice, potato chips, bread etc. Take 1 tablespoon of sugar dissolved in water. Take 1 tablespoon of honey in tea. Take 3 0r 4 tablets of glucose. Eat 3 or 4 hard candies. Eat mixed foods like peanut butter and crakers. Repeat testing after 15 minutes. If the results are persistent for 2 days in a row seek medical help.
